00023 #ifndef THREADPP_PREREQUISITES_H
00024 #define THREADPP_PREREQUISITES_H
00025 
00026 #include "ThreadPlatform.h"
00027 #include "ThreadStdHeaders.h"
00028 
00029 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00030 #       include <pthread.h>
00031 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00032 #       define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00033 #       include <windows.h>
00034 #else
00035 #       error "Unknown platform"
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 namespace threadpp
00039 {
00040         class Thread;
00041         class ThreadGroup;
00042         class Mutex;
00043         class Condition;
00044 };
00045 
00046 #endif
